programme.title: Tiada Tajuk
programme.desc: tiga orang pemuda kampung yang ingin menjadi penyanyi rock dan pop terkenal. Mereka berimpian besar tetapi tidak dihargai di kampung mereka. Pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan perlu mereka hadapi demi mencapai impian.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar
programme.desc: Seorang gangster veteran, Dollah yang selalu bermimpi menjadi pelakon mendapat peluang seumur hidup apabila pelakon popular memintanya untuk menjadi mentornya untuk filem aksi. Seorang samseng di lokasi penggambaran, Dollah pasti menimbulkan pelbagai kekacauan.

programme.title: Happy Birth Death
programme.desc: Sekumpulan teman wanita menyewa rumah agam untuk majlis hari jadi, hanya untuk mencari tetamu yang tidak diundang.

programme.title: Tmo Misteri Bulan Madu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Misteri Bulan Madu

programme.title: Suci Dalam Debu
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda berpelajaran tinggi lebih selesa hidup bebas dengan berperwatakan sebagai seorang 'rocker'. Pilihan dan cara hidupnya telah mengecewakan keluarganya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: Sarapee dan Pun mewarisi rumah agam pantai daripada Luang Narubal, suami dan dermawan yang mereka khianati dan tinggalkan untuk mati dalam kesedihan. Kedua-duanya kini memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah agam itu sebagai sebuah hotel untuk menjana wang.

programme.title: Tmo Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Jangan Ambil Nyawa Aku

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Cinta Kita
programme.desc: seorang gadis yang keciwa dalam percintaan alu mengubah wataknya menjadi seorang “tomboy” .Namun dia kembali kepada wanita semula setelah menemui cinta yang baru

programme.title: Reza, Arman & Bill
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Reza seorang pemuda yang gilakan bola sepak. Namun setelah dia cedera, yang mana kecederaan itu telah disengajakan oleh musuhnya, Arman, dia tidak mampu untuk bermain lagi. Perasaan untuk terus bermain bola juga lenyap, apatah lagi selalu diganggu oleh Arman dan rakan-rakan yang mengatakan dia seorang kaki bangku.

programme.title: Kuba Guling Karipap Pusing
programme.desc: pertelingkahan antara dua orang wanita akibat salah faham . Seorang wanita yang berniaga kuih di sebuah gerai membantu seorang wanita lain dengan mengambilnya sebagi pembantu dan akhirnya membantunya memulakan perniagaan bersamanya. Salah faham mula berlaku apabila kuih yang diperkenalkan mula mendapat perhatian ramai dan wanita yang dibantunya berkawan dengan lelaki yang selama ini menjadi pujaannya.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep11
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Vince And Kath And James
programme.desc: Cinta boleh menjadi rumit, terutamanya apabila Vince bersetuju untuk memikat Kath secara rahsia melalui teks bagi pihak James, sambil jatuh cinta padanya juga.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Slank Nggak Ada Matinya
programme.desc: Abdee dan Ridho dipanggil oleh SLANK, sebuah band rock, untuk datang jamming dengan Bimbim dan Ivan. Ternyata, SLANK ingin membuktikan bahawa SLANK tidak bersurai walaupun personelnya hanya tinggal Bimbim, Kaka dan Ivan pergi jelajah. Abdee dan Ridho turut dijemput, dan diberi syarat untuk dapat membawakan 35 buah lagu SLANK dalam masa 3 hari sahaja. Lawatan di sekitar kawasan itu bermula, dan ketika itulah pengembaraan SLANK bermula dengan format baharu.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: keharmonian sebuah rumah tangga diragut setelah ketua keluarga dinaikkan pangkat dan hanyut dengan nikmat dunia

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Masuk Jawi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang 3 orang budak lelaki bernama Tat,Syamin Dan Erry Yang Sudah beberapa Kali terlepas Dari berkhatan.dan Kali ini,mereka disunat oleh Tok mudim.

programme.title: Tmo Abang Saya Ustaz
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Abang Saya Ustaz

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: You'Re My Boss
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang mencari cinta dan lelaki yang boleh menerima dirinya yang terlalu tegas dan seorang wanita yang berkerjaya.

programme.title: Happy Birth Death
programme.desc: Sekumpulan teman wanita menyewa rumah agam untuk majlis hari jadi, hanya untuk mencari tetamu yang tidak diundang.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep12
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Slank Nggak Ada Matinya
programme.desc: Abdee dan Ridho dipanggil oleh SLANK, sebuah band rock, untuk datang jamming dengan Bimbim dan Ivan. Ternyata, SLANK ingin membuktikan bahawa SLANK tidak bersurai walaupun personelnya hanya tinggal Bimbim, Kaka dan Ivan pergi jelajah. Lawatan di sekitar kawasan itu bermula, dan ketika itulah pengembaraan SLANK bermula dengan format baharu.

programme.title: Tmo Abang Saya Ustaz
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Abang Saya Ustaz

programme.title: Di Pintu Syurga
programme.desc: Jannah disuruh untuk bernikah dengan Faris oleh ibu bapanya. Faris adalah seorang guru seni khat. Suatu malam, Jannah terlibat dalam kemalangan yang mengakibatkan dia mengalami amnesia. Jannah jatuh cinta dengan Faris, yang dianggap sebagai seorang lelaki yang sempurna dan layak menjadi imamnya suatu hari nanti. Sikap Jannah juga sudah berubah. Namun, kebahagiaan yang dimiliki mereka tidak kekal lama.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gila Gusti
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Mamat dan Zul, obses terhadap gusti dan mengidolakan ahli gusti tempatan terkenal bernama Naga. Apabila Naga tewas dalam perlawanan besarnya dan patah semangat untuk terus bergusti, Mamat dan Zul nekad untuk membantu idola mereka mencari semula semangat yang hilang demi memenangi semua kejuaraan gusti Asia Pasifik.

programme.title: Cinta Kita
programme.desc: seorang gadis yang keciwa dalam percintaan alu mengubah wataknya menjadi seorang “tomboy” .Namun dia kembali kepada wanita semula setelah menemui cinta yang baru

programme.title: Aku Istri Tak Pernah Punya Hak Layaknya Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Tergoda dengan kekayaan, Arina akhirnya berkahwin dengan Aldo. Namun, siapa sangka, Aldo bukanlah jejaka yang dibayangkan oleh Arina.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep50
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep9
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep36
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep38
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep51
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Udah Go Publik Tapi Masih Shy Shy Cat
programme.desc: Nenek Adit suruh Adit dan Raya kahwin. Mereka berpura-pura bersetuju pada awalnya, tetapi mereka jatuh cinta dari masa ke masa.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep60
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep23
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Doa Ibu Terzalimi Menuntun Anak Yang Lupa Diri Untuk Bertaubat
programme.desc: Puan Manik sudah tua dan tidak boleh lagi bekerja sebagai buruh di pasar. Anak lelaki Puan Manik, Andi, bekerja sebagai penunggang teksi motosikal. Namun, dia tidak meringankan kehidupan ibunya. Dia memaksa ibunya mencari lebih banyak wang supaya dia dapat memenuhi hasrat gaya hidup isterinya, Vita.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep73
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep85
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Anak Buta Mata Yang Menjadi Satu-Satunya Permata Dalam Keluarga
programme.desc: Mima, anak berkeperluan khas, menjadi tulang belakang keluarga. Dia menjual keropok untuk rawatan ibunya bernama, Lastri. Pada suatu hari, Mima telah difitnah kerana melakukan kecurian dengan mengambil dompet di dalam kereta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep74
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep11
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor…

programme.title: The Goblin

programme.desc: Returning for Season 3, the rules have been upgraded! The families are given more opportunities to tell their opinions while the guests are given more choices on whom to date.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Ep5
programme.desc: Love is without borders, love never comes late. This is a love-matching show of single seniors, with guests – 3 men and 4 women conducting one-on-one dating on stage in each episode. Before going on stage, the guests have the chance observing the one another in order to know them more.

programme.title: Dog and Cat’s Purpose Ep7
programme.desc: Taking the perspective of pets to tell stories between pets and human. As a dog and cat breeder, Zhu Zheng Ting and Zhang Yu Jian would live and interact with the pets, providing audience a whole new experience of keeping pets.

programme.title: Sign A Contract Ep5
programme.desc: The first e-commerce talent recruitment program in Mainland. Some behind-the-scenes experts from the top MCN organizations in the four major industries would form the strongest “Boss Group” while artists include Wong Cho Lam, Allen Lin, Naomi Wang, and Rachel Liu would be the guests of this show. All talents would use their unique tricks to strive for the Boss Group’s invitation.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep31
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep925926
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29192920
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1989
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3543
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45414542
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep929930
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1991
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep376
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1782
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1032
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Defying Chase
programme.desc: A stunt man is inadvertently caught in a criminal operation involving culture relics hustling, and has to fight for himself in a series of dangerous adventures.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father’s death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family…

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra’s blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father’s old rival.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: It's Meng Yuan-wen (star of The Master Strikes) versus Kuan Feng in this wild and wacky wushu saga of a priceless pole with a spectacular secret. A master martial artist's silly disciple struggles to save it from an evil white slaver, the slaver's duplicitous wife, and even his own bone-headed, but greedy, companion. Hsu Hsia choreographs the abundant action, as he had for both Five Superfighters and Drunken Master. The result is both sublime (for its kung-fu) and engagingly ridiculous.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Duel of the Century
programme.desc: In the mid-1980's Chu Yuan became internationally famous for starring as the nasty villain in Jackie Chan's groundbreaking worldwide hit, POLICE STORY. But for more than twenty-five years, he was famous as one of Hong Kong’s most respected directors of "Martial-art World" epics — often conceived by his remarkable collaborator, novelist Ku Lung. This was one of their last together for the Shaw Brothers Studio, but it's another revenge and mystery-tinged winner. Liu Yung and Sun Chien (the Korean kicking THE FIVE VENOM from Chang Cheh's internationally popular series) team to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, double-dealings, imposters, and one deadly duel after another. No less than three choreographers are on hand to handle the multitude of martial arts, making this one of Chu Yuan's most involving and exciting efforts ever.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fiancé, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like…

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancée suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancée accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The "Venoms" were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one "venom" and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu school's students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke), Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the director's best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, "bloody good" entertainment!

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiancé. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Mirchi Masala
programme.desc: A woman decides to fight against her powerful oppressor. When the guard of a chilli factory helps her, the women and the teacher of the village join them to openly defy the prevailing repression.

programme.title: Cheranin Thirumanam
programme.desc: Mahesh and Aathira fall in love and tell their parents about their relationship. Though the families initially agree, they suddenly change their minds owing to the financial differences between them.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Malaysia To Amnesia
programme.desc: Malaysia To Amnesia revolves around two childhood friends who plan to get married. However, they face complications as they are unable to cope with married life.

programme.title: Thirumanam
programme.desc: Santhosh marries Janani against his will in order to fulfil his parents' wish. However, she believes that they will lead a happy life but soon finds out that her husband loves another woman.

programme.title: Oru Pakka Kathai
programme.desc: Meera and Saravanan fall in love with each other and decide to get married after completing their education. However, their lives turn upside down when she gets pregnant while still being a virgin.

programme.title: Mannar Vageyra
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Veera loses his father in a village fight arising out of a long-standing rivalry. Can he avenge his father's death and put an end to the violence?

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: While conducting an investigation into the mysterious death of a fellow officer, a cop's own reputation is questioned when a suspect in his custody is shot.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: The story is about how an ex-army officer brings change in society by making people to help each other.

programme.title: Geethanjali
programme.desc: James, a Hindu orphan, is raised by Lawrence, a Catholic priest. Diana, a rich and arrogant woman, falls for him. Since he loves Julie, he's caught in a dilemma when Lawrence urges him to marry Diana.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep44B
programme.desc: The series revolves around the adventures of Tapu and The Gokuldham Society, and if something wrong happens, Tapu and his friends solve the problems.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.title: Saajan Ki Saheli
programme.desc: Kunti abandons her baby in order to lead a lavish life and marries a rich man. Years later, she realises that her husband is indulging in an affair and is shocked to find out the truth about the girl.

programme.desc: Kunti abandons her baby in order to lead a lavish life and marries a rich man. Years later, she realises that her husband is indulging in an affair and is shocked to find out the truth about the girl.

programme.title: Sanam Bewafa

programme.title: ACP Shiva

programme.title: Student of the Year
programme.desc: Abhimanyu and Rohan are good friends. However, their friendship is affected after they compete to win a title and Abhimanyu falls in love with Shanaya, Rohan's girlfriend.

programme.title: Super Star

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. When he tries to molest her, she leaves him, and Rajiv tries to pursue another woman.

programme.desc: Ties That Bind - A former kidnapping victim is linked to a series of murders that includes the daughter of an NYPD detective. Kristen begins to doubt her ability as an agent after a training exercise leaves her shaken.

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the school’s notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Love In Monaco
programme.desc: Mehdi, a 30-year-old man living with his mother in the housing projects, finds himself with a tidy sum of money after winning the lottery. He decides to play high rollers in Monaco with the money, and assumes a new identity as a Moroccan prince.

programme.title: Blood Pressure
programme.desc: Nicole, a 41-year-old wife bored with her mundane life, receives letters from a mysterious observer. Enticed, she plays along but they soon get out of hand and threaten to tear apart her relationship with her husband and two teenage children.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine
programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the school’s notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents

programme.title: Nanny On Board II: In South Africa
programme.desc: Henni, as the premium nanny, finds herself in a South African farm. Her employer is Konrad, a harsh grandfather. However, she soon discovers that beneath his cold exterior is a sensitive man with a wounded heart. She falls for him and things soon unravel.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagros’s happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wife’s growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: In Love With My Boss
programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.

programme.title: The Boss And The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: A Summer In Antwerp

programme.title: Commitment Asli

programme.title: Rabbit Without Ears

programme.title: A Song For Mia

programme.title: The Mine
programme.desc: An ecocritical film that explores capitalistic greed and environmental destruction. A young civil servant, Jussi, is in charge of the environmental permit of a huge mine. He soon discovers dangerous truths about its operations but his job is on the line.

programme.title: Patchwork Family

programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows - Charles’ snoring is keeping Hawkeye and B.J. awake at night. When they try and talk with him about it, he angrily denies being a snorer and refuses to discuss any suggestions. The problem continues until Hawkeye and B.J. expose Charles’ snoring to some select witnesses and Charles can no longer deny the truth. Potter is overjoyed when his son-in-law manages to pull some strings to visit him while he is in Tokyo on business. However, Potter’s happiness fades when he finds out his son-in-law has had affair while in Tokyo. Potter nearly tells his daughter during a late night phone call but instead talks with his son-in-law and tells him of his own infidelity years ago. Both men agree to live and learn with some regrets.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep11
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows - Charles’ snoring is keeping Hawkeye and B.J. awake at night. When they try and talk with him about it, he angrily denies being a snorer and refuses to discuss any suggestions. The problem continues until Hawkeye and B.J. expose Charles’ snoring to some select witnesses and Charles can no longer deny the truth. Potter is overjoyed when his son-in-law manages to pull some strings to visit him while he is in Tokyo on business. However, Potter’s happiness fades when he finds out his son-in-law has had affair while in Tokyo. Potter nearly tells his daughter during a late night phone call but instead talks with his son-in-law and tells him of his own infidelity years ago. Both men agree to live and learn with some regrets.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep12
programme.desc: Say No More - Lieutenant Curt Collins comes to the 4077th with a leg injury resulting from his heroic actions during a recent battle. A fat embolism takes the young soldier’s life and Hawkeye is left with the unpleasant news of telling the soldier’s father, General Collins. The General react with shock and anger and Hawkeye sees that, for perhaps the first time, the grim reality of war has touched the old soldier. Meanwhile, Hot Lips gets laryngitis and must cancel her plans to meet with a doctor that she has had her heart set on for some time. Charles, while disapproving of her choice in men, does Hot Lips an uncharacteristic good turn by arranging for the doctor to visit her at the 4077th. Hot Lips, already speechless, is also pleasantly surprised.

programme.desc: Friends and Enemies - One of Potter’s oldest friends, Col. Woody Cooke of I-Corps, is amongst the wounded who arrive at the 4077th. Cooke's wounds are minor but there are a lot of serious casualties amongst his men. When Hawkeye and B.J. make the discovery that the men were injured due to Cooke’s error they break the news to Potter. Potter is angered and refuses to believe them until he investigates the story and finds it is true. When he confronts Cooke about the incident, Cooke asks Potter to cover the whole thing up for him. Potter refuses and loses his oldest friend but he also realizes what good friends he has in Hawkeye and B.J.

programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: When a prisoner escapes, the New York City detective and his partner are teamed with a Japanese detective to recapture him, leading the audience into Osaka's exotic underworld, where rival Yakuza crime factions battle for supremacy.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent, fired for being honorable, fights for his ideals and those who depend on him.

programme.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark
programme.desc: Archeologist-adventurer Indiana Jones masterfully vanquishes all manner of foe while in search for the Ark of the Covenant in this action packed adventure. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Picture.

programme.title: Oxenfree
programme.desc: Three estranged foster brothers rediscover the ruins of their childhood kingdom 'Oxenfree'...and face down the monster living within.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers get a brutal education when a mission gone awry results in the U.S. military's single biggest firefight since Vietnam.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: An Imperfect Murder
programme.desc: An actress's nightmare about killing her ex-boyfriend somehow becomes a reality.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Bad Country concerns a veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent, fired for being honorable, fights for his ideals and those who depend on him.

programme.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark
programme.desc: Archeologist-adventurer Indiana Jones masterfully vanquishes all manner of foe while in search for the Ark of the Covenant in this action packed adventure. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Picture.

programme.desc: Yogyakarta to Surabaya - Beginning in Java's royal city, Yogyakarta, Michael Portillo visits the Sultan's Palace and witnesses the ancient art of shadow puppetry, known as wayang.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Yorkshire - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to see the Owens in the Yorkshire Dales.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predator Power - Steve goes in search of some of the most powerful predators on the planet. At historic Warwick Castle, we meet the stellar sea eagle, the world's heaviest eagle.

programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.desc: Changing Planet - Cameras in space show that Earth is changing rapidly. Cities sprawl while forests and glaciers shrink. But in Tanzania locals have regenerated the landscape to save chimpanzees.

programme.desc: Penang to Cameron Highlands - Michael rides one of the steepest and fastest funicular railways in the world and steps into a tropical paradise as he releases exotic specimens at Malaysia's first butterfly sanctuary.

programme.desc: Discover how engineers built Zaha Hadid's Antwerp Port House, find out how 432 Park Avenue New York was built and marvel at Kengo Kuma's Victoria & Albert Museum in Dundee, Scotland.

programme.desc: See how the cheese met the peanut butter in this legendary sandwich snack; get the scoop on two-toned frozen fruit bars from Florida; 1.5 million blueberry dumplings are produced in just one shift; and it takes a mountain of super-food to make tantalizing kale chips.

programme.desc: Travellers - Chris discovers the cleverest animal travellers and how they find their way, from deer with mental maps, blue whales planning routes, and dung beetles navigating by the stars.

programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur to Johor Bahru - In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Northern Predators - Cyril goes to the edge of the Arctic to hear terrifying tales of huge fish ripping apart fishermen's nets. He sets off in pursuit of a legendary giant fish.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Melt-in-your-mouth chocolate mints are lovingly finished by hand. In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Matters - For primates, family is everything. Complex social lives are key to their success.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Singapore - Michael Portillo's railway tour reaches its final stop - Singapore. Michael walks the streets of Chinatown with a local artist and uncovers the history of the Chinese community there.

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Scotland - Robson visits the west coast of Scotland for some of the area's famous shellfish fishing.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Patagonia - Robson's journey continues in Patagonia, where he goes on the hunt for the massive Chinook Salmon.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Gardens in the Clouds Ep2
programme.desc: The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured people’s imagination. It’s a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Reef Wrecks of Bonaire Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail Ep2
programme.desc: The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Delta Discoveries Ep3
programme.desc: The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears Ep1
programme.desc: This documentary looks at the wildlife of The Drakensberg Mountain range. We take a look at how creatures survive in the hostile landscape, from the highest peaks to the rolling grasslands below.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Gardens in the Clouds Ep2
programme.desc: The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured people’s imagination. It’s a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Feathering Nest Ep4
programme.desc: Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.
